message: This is a fair start, Bob.  I'm sure we can work something out that benefits both of us.
Let's split this evenly, Alice. A fair deal saves us both time and money.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  This offer still gives you a good share, but it reflects the fact that your money is losing value faster than mine.
Time is running out, Alice. This is a compromise that still gives you a larger share, but acknowledges the urgency for me.
